name: BIVIUM
description:
BIVIUM is a 3D, action-adventure style video game set in a medieval style.

The genre in which we frame all this is summed up in the fantasy and adventure genre with a medieval and anime aesthetic.

We present Merulea, who arrives at the guild city of Bivium to face the four access tests to the guilds given by each of them, who hate each other and after a final verdict they start to argue among themselves to decide who You will be able to recruit her. In the middle of the discussion a monster wakes up in the depths of the school and Merulea will have to go and defeat it.

Do not forget to upload your feedback and tag us on our instagram social network.

https://www.instagram.com/biviumthegame/
